title: Individual Cultural Tour in 4 cities of Uzbekistan
overview: Experience a unique cultural journey through Uzbekistan. Explore Tashkent’s historical sites, including the famous Khast-Imam Complex and Chorsu Bazaar. Discover the beauty of the Chimgan Mountains and Amirsoy Resort. Travel to Samarkand on a high-speed train and visit iconic landmarks such as Registan Square and Gur-e-Amir Mausoleum. Enjoy optional experiences like pottery classes and visiting a local Uzbek family.
included: ✅ Local guides in Tashkent, Samarkand, and Bukhara
additional: Train tickets are included in the price for all 4 cities. Before booking, we will communicate with you — in some cases, you may need to book them yourself and we will deduct that from your tour fee. Same with hotels — we provide recommendations that you can book, or we can book them for you!

itinerary.title: Tashkent City Tour
activities: Lunch at Beshqozon Plov Center + Tashkent TV Tower

itinerary.title: Tashkent Mountain Tour
activities: Amirsoy Ski Resort (skiing, snowboarding, cable car ride)

itinerary.title: Samarkand City Tour – Day 2
activities: Eternal City at Samarkand Silk Road

title: Uzbekistan City Tours
overview: This guided city tour includes 1 or 2 days in each city. Here are the plans for different cities! You can choose and book — let us know for which city, how many days, and how many people. Price is given for 1 day. Discount available for more than 2 people and for 2 days.
included: ✅ Pick-up from airports, train stations, or hotel, with drop-off

itinerary.title: Tashkent City Tour
activities: Lunch at Beshqozon Plov Center + Tashkent TV Tower

itinerary.title: Shahrisabz Day Trip from Samarkand
activities: Departure from Samarkand through scenic landscapes
Lunch on the way – famous Tanduri Lamb
Explore lively local market (souvenirs, crafts, delicacies)

title: Mountain Tours: Tashkent and Samarkand
overview: Enjoy a refreshing day in the mountains in Tashkent and Samarkand. Explore the Chimgan and Amirsoy resorts, take a cable car ride, hike or ski, and enjoy the beautiful nature of Uzbekistan or ride horses,donkey cook natioanal dishes in mountains of Samarkand everything well organised. Price here given for up to 3 people Discount available for more than 3 people. Once you have booked the tour and choose the city you can go ahead for negotiation!
included: ✅ Private transport from cities to mountains
notIncluded: ❌ Water jets or cable car fees

itinerary.title: Mountain Escape Tashkent
activities: Cable car ride to the peak

itinerary.title: Mountain Escape to Samarkand.
activities: Stop at a local bazaar for picnic supplies
Arrive at the village near Hazrat Daud Cave
Ascend the mountain by horse, donkey, or trek up 1527 stairs
Reach the summit and visit the mosque
Enjoy panoramic views and take photos/videos
Explore Hazrat Daud Cave and learn about its legends
See handprints believed to belong to Prophet Daud
Enjoy a traditional lunch prepared by a local chef
Shop at the village market for souvenirs

title: Tajikistan, Seven Lakes
overview: Travel across the border to the stunning Fann Mountains in Tajikistan and discover the legendary Seven Lakes. Perfect for nature lovers and hikers looking for a breathtaking day trip. Prices are per person. Discount available for more than 2 people.If you are a group, couple or family, we have amazing offers — kindly send us your information via WhatsApp.

itinerary.title: Seven Lakes Adventure from Samarkand
activities: Depart Samarkand by private car or guide
Meet local Tajik driver in Penjikent
Quick visit to Penjikent Bazaar or Rudaki Museum
Drive to Seven Lakes (Haft Kul) via Shing Valley
Visit Mijgon, Soya, Hushyor, Nofin, Khurdak, Marguzor, Hazorchashma Lakes
Enjoy photo stops, short hikes, and picnic lunch by a lake (Marguzor or Hazorchashma)
Return to Jartepa border and cross back to Uzbekistan
Transfer to hotel in Samarkand and rest

title: Walking Tours in Every City of Uzbekistan (Solo & Groups)
overview: Tours in each city start from a meeting point. One day before the tour, our guides will contact you and provide details. You may ask any questions you’re interested in. Prices start from $50 per person. For couples or pairs: $80. Discount available for more than 2 people. If you're okay joining a group of random people we give you amazing offers.

itinerary.title: Tours Available in Tashkent, Samarkand, Bukhara, Khiva
activities: We will provide the itinerary after you choose your city or you can see that on the page of Uzbekistan City Tours.

title: Cooking&Baking Materclass of Uzbek natioal dishes(Samarkand)
overview:
A hands-on cultural and culinary tour outside Samarkand. Visit the famous Bagizagan Wine Factory, shop for fresh groceries at a local market, and head to a village house to learn traditional bread baking and plov cooking from a local chef. Ideal for food lovers and culture seekers. Includes hotel pick-up and return to Samarkand by 17:00. 
  
 Additional: We have available local houses to stay in you can book that with agreement by us feel free to conversation we give best offers always :)
included: ✅ Hands-on cooking experience with local chef
notIncluded: ❌ Groceries to purchase unless we had agreement

itinerary.title: Bagizagan Wine & Culinary Adventure
activities: Pick-up from your hotel in Samarkand
Drive 30 minutes out of the city towards Bagizagan
Visit and explore the Bagizagan Wine Factory
Shop for groceries at a local market
Arrive at a traditional village house
Meet the chef, baker, and host family
Prepare ingredients and cook plov with the chef
Make dough and bake traditional bread
Wash and wrap baked bread to take home as a gift
Relax and enjoy free time in the village
Return to Samarkand city center by 17:00

title: Photo shooting in must see places of Samarkand
overview:
As everyone you may like to have quality and unforgattable pictures for your portfolio, social media accounts or others — what if they are in must-see places under UNESCO heritage with national clothes? 
 We do not mind if you bring your own clothes! Our professional cameras are always ready for you.
Meeting point: Registan Square.

Additional: You may have pictures with different clothes in different locations, but please let us know in advance to avoid misunderstandings with cost and program. Thank you!
included: ✅ National dress by your choice and hundreds of picture and videos
notIncluded: ❌ Clothes more than 1(unless we have agreement!)
